FAQ / Custom Cards / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 2 / Battle Cards /
WARNING: This card is a part of a custom card set; it is not an official Wizards of the Coast TF:TCG card.

Take By Surprise

  1. Does this “scrap” the Upgrade that moves to the top of the deck? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    No, this is a new way of interacting with Upgrades. Similar to returning an upgrade to a player’s hand, instead it is placed on the top of their battle deck. Abilities that prevent the Scrapping of an upgrade will not work on Take by Surprise (similar to Disarm).
